item.title: 7. Topbar Menu
item.description: In this section, I’ll explain how I implemented the topbar menu. I implemented this menu to test and operate various functions between backend and the worker services. 1. The design of the Topbar Menu To keep things simple, I used react-bootstrap for the UI components, as I’m not currently focused on visual design. I’ll improve the visual styling in a future version after completing version 1 of this project. The topbar includes a set of menu items and a logout button. 1.1 Topbar Menu Structure To visualize the layout, I created a simple diagram of the topbar menu.
